author: chfast
content: <@543900561460822016> I plan to do some more experimenting with EOF in Python. We have an outdated EOF validation implemented. Do you think it is worth to share any of this code with other Python projects?

author: lightclient
content: I think the execution specs folks would be interested in it!

author: chfast
content: Interested in our impl or rather we pull from them?

author: lightclient
content: They were looking for someone to help implement EOF in the specs a while ago, so I think they would be interested in your impl, at least as a starting place
